snippet: BLANK--Robert S. A dear, warm, wonderful man who enriched the lives of all who knew him. There is nothing he wouldn't do to help his many friends. We will never forget you and all the great times we shared together. We will miss you terribly. Our thoughts and love go out to Nancy and the family. Beth and Earle Yaffa 1/3
lead_paragraph: BLANK--Robert S. A dear, warm, wonderful man who enriched the lives of all who knew him. There is nothing he wouldn't do to help his many friends. We will never forget you and all the great times we shared together. We will miss you terribly. Our thoughts and love go out to Nancy and the family. Beth and Earle Yaffa 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BLANK, ROBERT S
